section.title: Terminating the Power State of Instances
section.para: Stop any number of instances through the CloudForms Management Engine console using the following procedure.

procedure.title: To Terminate the Power State of Instances

step.para: Check the instances that you want to terminate.

Click
(Power Operations). Note that the only operations that will be available are the ones that apply to the instances' current power state.

Click
(Terminate) to stop the selected instances.
